Song.title: His Name Is Jesus
Song.copyright: Music by Oliver Holden Words by Edward Perronet Vs 4 by John Rippon Chorus by Judah Groveman © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E | C#m B | E | C#m B |]
Verse 1: All [E]hail the power of [B]Jesus’ name Let [A]angels p[B]rostrate [E]fall Bring [E]forth the royal [B]dia[E]dem and [E]Crown Him [C#m]Lord of [B]all Bring [E]forth the royal [B]diadem and [E/G#]Crown [A]Him [E/B B]Lord [ ]of [||: E | C#m B :||]all
Verse 2: Ye [E]chosen seed of [B]Israel’s race Ye [A]ransomed [B]from the [E]fall Hail [E]Him who saves you [B]by His [E]grace and [E]Crown Him [C#m]Lord of [B]all Hail [E]Him who saves you [B]by His grace and [E/G#]Crown [A]Him [E/B B]Lord [ ]of [E]all. [ | E]
Chorus: His name is [A]Jesus Risen [E]Lamb, for sinners [B]slain His name is [A]Jesus All cre[C#m]ation sings the [B]praise Of Jesus’ [||: E | C#m B :||]name.
{new_page} Verse 3: Let [E]every kindred, [B]every tribe On [A]this terre[B]strial [E]ball To [E]Him all majes[B]ty as[E]cribe and [E]Crown Him [C#m]Lord of [B]all To [E]Him all majes[B]ty ascribe and [E/G#]Crown [A]Him [E/B B]Lord [ ]of [E]all. [ | E]
Chorus: His name is [A]Jesus Risen [E]Lamb, for sinners [B]slain His name is [A]Jesus All crea[C#m]-tion sings the [B]praise Of Jesus’ [||: E | C#m B :||]name.
Verse 4: Oh [E]that with yonder [B]sacred throng We [A]at His [B]feet may [E]fall We’ll [E]join the ever[B]lasting [E]song and [E]Crown Him [C#m]Lord of [B]all We’ll [E]join the ever[B]lasting song and [E/G#]Crown [A]Him [E/B B]Lord [ ] of [E]all. [ | E]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 all hail the power of jesus name let angels prostrate fall bring forth the royal diadem and crown him lord of all bring forth the royal diadem and crown him lord of all verse 2 ye chosen seed of israels race ye ransomed from the fall hail him who saves you by his grace and crown him lord of all hail him who saves you by his grace and crown him lord of all chorus his name is jesus risen lamb for sinners slain his name is jesus all creation sings the praise of jesus name verse 3 let every kindred every tribe on this terrestrial ball to him all majesty ascribe and crown him lord of all to him all majesty ascribe and crown him lord of all chorus his name is jesus risen lamb for sinners slain his name is jesus all creation sings the praise of jesus name verse 4 oh that with yonder sacred throng we at his feet may fall well join the everlasting song and crown him lord of all well join the everlasting song and crown him lord of all
